customSlashCommands.name: clone-repos
customSlashCommands.description: Clone SGLang, FlashInfer (GitHub) and flashinfer-trace (HuggingFace) to third_party/
customSlashCommands.prompt: Read .claude/skills/clone-repos.md and execute the skill as described. Clone the repos to third_party/ directory.

customSlashCommands.name: extract-kernel-definitions
customSlashCommands.description: Extract kernel schemas from SGLang model implementations with deduplication
customSlashCommands.prompt: Read .claude/skills/extract-kernel-definitions.md and execute the skill as described. Extract kernel definitions from the specified model.

customSlashCommands.name: add-reference-tests
customSlashCommands.description: Add tests to validate reference implementations against FlashInfer/SGLang ground truth
customSlashCommands.prompt: Read .claude/skills/add-reference-tests.md and execute the skill as described. Add reference tests for the specified definitions.
